item.title: How to import an Excel file in RStudio
How to install R and RStudio?
item.description: What is R and RStudio? R RStudio The main components of RStudio Further applications Use RStudio as a calculator What is R and RStudio? R R is nothing more than a programming language. At the time of writing, this language is (one of) the leading program in statistics, although not the only programming language used by statisticians. In order to use R, we need two things:
